title: POLICE BLOCK ALL ROADS TO SANCHI TO PREVENT VAIKO MEN
content: Onlanka News – by Walter Jayawardhana The Madhya Pradesh police took unprecedented security measures in view of President Rajapaksa’s visit  to Sanchi to lay a foundation stone for a new university for Buddhist and Indic studies when it closed all roads to Sanchi to prevent MDMK party followers from reaching there to hold a black…
